question: Which three countries form the coastlines of the "Wadden Sea"?
option4: United States of America, Mexico and Nicaragua
explanation: Denmark, Germany and the Netherlands form the coastlines of the Wadden Sea. The Wadden Sea is an inter-tidal zone located in the southeastern part of the North Sea. It is a shallow body of water with tidal flats and wetlands located between the coast of north-western Europe and the Frisian Islands. It is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. It is an important breeding ground for the migratory birds.
